The Beatles_Here Comes The Sun - Remaste.valence: High because the song's tone is optimistic and joyful, celebrating the return of happiness and light.
The Beatles_Here Comes The Sun - Remaste.mode: Major because the melody and chord progression are bright and uplifting, typical of positive themes.

Corinne Bailey Rae_Put Your Records On.mode: Major because the song's key and melodic progression create a bright and happy atmosphere.
